<scale 0.8>Moorhuhn pulled into the wild west and prepared on...</scale>
<scale 0.8>Lesshuhn moved to the South African jungle and ran a chicken farm. He now is in detention for undisclosed reasons.</scale>
<scale 0.8>Moorfrosch works at the German meteorological central office and forecasts the weather.  Sometimes correctly.</scale>
<scale 0.8>Pumpkin hired himself for different Hollywood productions as an amateur actor and now aims for a career as a politician.</scale>

expedition in the desert Gobi.

<scale 0.8>Hank became an undercover agent for a secret service - after an eventful, but short career he was fired, because they found out he was a mole.</scale>
